title: Mortal Kombat
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  FATALITY LIVES THE DEADLIEST TOURNAMENT IS BACK WITH ALL THE KOMBATANTS AND THEIR UNIQUE FATALITIES.

childDownloads.title: Baraka Helmet
childDownloads.description: Become the emperor’s favorite Tarkatan Warrior with the Baraka helmet.

childDownloads.title: Cyrax Helmet
childDownloads.description: Surrender your humanity and embrace the Cyrax helmet. It is foolish to resist.

childDownloads.title: Ermac Mask
childDownloads.description: The keeper of souls and Shao Kahn's foremost enforcer wears this mask.

childDownloads.title: Ermac Outfit
childDownloads.description: You may be one, but now you can be many with the official Ermac outfit.

childDownloads.title: Ermac Outfit
childDownloads.description: You may be one, but now you can be many with the official Ermac outfit.

childDownloads.title: Mortal Kombat Compatibility Pack 3 featuring Klassic Skins
childDownloads.description: Download the Kitana and Jade Klassic Mortal Kombat 2 skins but beware these alluring yet dangerous kombatants. Please Note: This pack also contains a compatibility update. Please download prior to your next Mortal Kombat multiplayer match on Xbox LIVE. Visit www.themortalkombat.com for details.

childDownloads.title: Kabal Outfit
childDownloads.description: Hide your true form and deliver justice to your enemies with the official Kabal outfit.

childDownloads.title: Kano’s Eye Helmet
childDownloads.description: Few men can don the Kano cybernetic eye and command the ruthless Black Dragon clan.  Can you?

childDownloads.title: Klassic Skins Pack #1
childDownloads.description: Relive the Klassic days of Mortal Kombat just the way you remember. Download the Klassic Skins Pack #1 and receive 7 Klassic Character Skins (Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Reptile, Ermac, Kitana, Mileena, Jade) and 3 Klassic Fatalities (Scorpion, Sub-Zero, Reptile).

childDownloads.title: Mileena Mask
childDownloads.description: Forged in Shang Tsung’s Flesh Pits, Mileena is the perfect blend of beauty and beast. It’s takes a special kind of woman to wear her mask.

childDownloads.title: MK Dragon T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Warning! Only true MK fans wear the official MK Dragon T-Shirt.

childDownloads.title: MK Dragon T-Shirt
childDownloads.description: Warning! Only true MK fans wear the official MK Dragon T-Shirt.

childDownloads.title: Mortal Kombat
childDownloads.description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  FATALITY LIVES THE DEADLIEST TOURNAMENT IS BACK WITH ALL THE KOMBATANTS AND THEIR UNIQUE FATALITIES.

childDownloads.title: Warrior Kenshi
childDownloads.description: Download and play as the Warrior Kenshi. For years the swordsman Kenshi traveled the world in search of worthy opponents. A mysterious man offered to show him the location of Sento, an ancient sword worthy of his abilities. When Kenshi retrieved the sword, spirits of ancient warriors spewed forth, blinding him. This Add-on content is included in the Mortal Kombat Season Pass.  If you have purchased the Mortal Kombat Pass please do not purchase this content as you will be charged again.

childDownloads.title: Mortal Kombat Compatibility Pack 1 featuring Sektor and Cyrax Klassic Skins
childDownloads.description: Download the Sektor and Cyrax Klassic Mortal Kombat 3 skins and unite the Lin Kuei. Please Note: This pack also contains a compatibility update. Please download prior to your next Mortal Kombat multiplayer match on Xbox LIVE. Visit www.themortalkombat.com for details.

childDownloads.title: Mortal Kombat Season Pass
childDownloads.description: Season Pass contains four downloadable characters Skarlet, Kenshi, Rain and a mystery warrior. Buy Season Pass and get all four warriors for the price of three. After purchasing the Mortal Kombat Pass, all content must be accessed through the Mortal Kombat in-game store.   All game content included in the Mortal Kombat Season Pass is also available for sale as individual purchases on Xbox Live marketplace.  Do not download this content from Xbox Live Marketplace to avoid being charged twice.

childDownloads.title: Mortal Kombat Compatibility Pack 2 featuring Smoke and Noob Saibot Klassic Skins
childDownloads.description: Only true warriors download the Smoke and Noob Saibot Klassic Mortal Kombat skins. Please Note: This pack also contains a compatibility update. Please download prior to your next Mortal Kombat multiplayer match on Xbox LIVE. Visit www.themortalkombat.com for details.

childDownloads.title: Mortal Kombat Compatibility Pack 4 featuring Sub Zero Klassic Skins
childDownloads.description: Download Sub Zero’s Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 and Cyber Sub Zero Klassic skins and complete your kollection.  Please Note: This pack also contains a compatibility update. Please download prior to your next Mortal Kombat multiplayer match on Xbox LIVE. Visit www.themortalkombat.com for details.

childDownloads.description: All you need to be the Protector of EarthRealm are godlike powers and a cool hat.  Purchase the hat here. Note: godlike powers not included.
